snippet: The bank reported a second-quarter profit of $5 billion, down 9 percent, and said it would restate its first-quarter earnings.
abstract: The bank reported a second-quarter profit of $5 billion, down 9 percent, and said it would restate its first-quarter earnings.

headline.main: JPMorgan Says Trading Loss Tops $5.8 Billion; Profit for Quarter Falls 9%
